name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Business identifiers assigned to this care plan by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Business identifiers assigned to this care plan by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Business identifiers assigned to this care plan by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

name: $instantiatesCanonical
desc: Returns: The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined protocol, guideline, questionnaire or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this CarePlan.

name: $addinstantiatesCanonical
desc: The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined protocol, guideline, questionnaire or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this CarePlan.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined protocol, guideline, questionnaire or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this CarePlan.

name: $instantiatesUri
desc: Returns: The URL pointing to an externally maintained protocol, guideline, questionnaire or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this CarePlan.

name: $addinstantiatesUri
desc: The URL pointing to an externally maintained protocol, guideline, questionnaire or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this CarePlan.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The URL pointing to an externally maintained protocol, guideline, questionnaire or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this CarePlan.

name: $basedOn
desc: Returns: A care plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this care plan.

name: $addbasedOn
desc: A care plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this care plan.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A care plan that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this care plan.

name: $replaces
desc: Returns: Completed or terminated care plan whose function is taken by this new care plan.

name: $addreplaces
desc: Completed or terminated care plan whose function is taken by this new care plan.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Completed or terminated care plan whose function is taken by this new care plan.

name: $partOf
desc: Returns: A larger care plan of which this particular care plan is a component or step.

name: $addpartOf
desc: A larger care plan of which this particular care plan is a component or step.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A larger care plan of which this particular care plan is a component or step.

name: $status
desc: Returns: Indicates whether the plan is currently being acted upon, represents future intentions or is now a historical record.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates whether the plan is currently being acted upon, represents future intentions or is now a historical record.

name: $intent
desc: Returns: Indicates the level of authority/intentionality associated with the care plan and where the care plan fits into the workflow chain.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the level of authority/intentionality associated with the care plan and where the care plan fits into the workflow chain.

name: $category
desc: Returns: Identifies what "kind" of plan this is to support differentiation between multiple co-existing plans; e.g. "Home health", "psychiatric", "asthma", "disease management", "wellness plan", etc.

name: $addcategory
desc: Identifies what "kind" of plan this is to support differentiation between multiple co-existing plans; e.g. "Home health", "psychiatric", "asthma", "disease management", "wellness plan", etc.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies what "kind" of plan this is to support differentiation between multiple co-existing plans; e.g. "Home health", "psychiatric", "asthma", "disease management", "wellness plan", etc.

name: $title
desc: Returns: Human-friendly name for the care plan.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Human-friendly name for the care plan.

name: $description
desc: Returns: A description of the scope and nature of the plan.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A description of the scope and nature of the plan.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: Identifies the patient or group whose intended care is described by the plan.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the patient or group whose intended care is described by the plan.

name: $encounter
desc: Returns: The Encounter during which this CarePlan was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The Encounter during which this CarePlan was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

name: $period
desc: Returns: Indicates when the plan did (or is intended to) come into effect and end.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates when the plan did (or is intended to) come into effect and end.

name: $created
desc: Returns: Represents when this particular CarePlan record was created in the system, which is often a system-generated date.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Represents when this particular CarePlan record was created in the system, which is often a system-generated date.

name: $author
desc: Returns: When populated, the author is responsible for the care plan.  The care plan is attributed to the author.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: When populated, the author is responsible for the care plan.  The care plan is attributed to the author.

name: $contributor
desc: Returns: Identifies the individual(s) or organization who provided the contents of the care plan.

name: $addcontributor
desc: Identifies the individual(s) or organization who provided the contents of the care plan.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies the individual(s) or organization who provided the contents of the care plan.

name: $careTeam
desc: Returns: Identifies all people and organizations who are expected to be involved in the care envisioned by this plan.

name: $addcareTeam
desc: Identifies all people and organizations who are expected to be involved in the care envisioned by this plan.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies all people and organizations who are expected to be involved in the care envisioned by this plan.

name: $addressesCode
desc: Returns: Identifies the conditions/problems/concerns/diagnoses/etc. whose management and/or mitigation are handled by this plan.

name: $addaddressesCode
desc: Identifies the conditions/problems/concerns/diagnoses/etc. whose management and/or mitigation are handled by this plan.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies the conditions/problems/concerns/diagnoses/etc. whose management and/or mitigation are handled by this plan.

name: $addressesReference
desc: Returns: Identifies the conditions/problems/concerns/diagnoses/etc. whose management and/or mitigation are handled by this plan.

name: $addaddressesReference
desc: Identifies the conditions/problems/concerns/diagnoses/etc. whose management and/or mitigation are handled by this plan.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies the conditions/problems/concerns/diagnoses/etc. whose management and/or mitigation are handled by this plan.

name: $supportingInfo
desc: Returns: Identifies portions of the patient's record that specifically influenced the formation of the plan.  These might include comorbidities, recent procedures, limitations, recent assessments, etc.

name: $addsupportingInfo
desc: Identifies portions of the patient's record that specifically influenced the formation of the plan.  These might include comorbidities, recent procedures, limitations, recent assessments, etc.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies portions of the patient's record that specifically influenced the formation of the plan.  These might include comorbidities, recent procedures, limitations, recent assessments, etc.

name: $goal
desc: Returns: Describes the intended objective(s) of carrying out the care plan.

name: $addgoal
desc: Describes the intended objective(s) of carrying out the care plan.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Describes the intended objective(s) of carrying out the care plan.

name: $activity
desc: Returns: Identifies an action that has occurred or is a planned action to occur as part of the plan. For example, a medication to be used, lab tests to perform, self-monitoring that has occurred, education etc.

name: $addactivity
desc: Identifies an action that has occurred or is a planned action to occur as part of the plan. For example, a medication to be used, lab tests to perform, self-monitoring that has occurred, education etc.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies an action that has occurred or is a planned action to occur as part of the plan. For example, a medication to be used, lab tests to perform, self-monitoring that has occurred, education etc.

name: $note
desc: Returns: General notes about the care plan not covered elsewhere.

name: $addnote
desc: General notes about the care plan not covered elsewhere.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: General notes about the care plan not covered elsewhere.
